markdown_content: Bob Zollman has been in the truck & trailer accessory business for decades - but his passion is racing.  If there is a local century ride, triathlon, or road race - he’s probably been in it more than once.  In 2016 - Bob decided to share his passion and expertise for bicycles by opening Zollman’s Elite Cyclery in Mattoon.  Whether you need  a new or used road bike, a mountain bike or just a tuneup.  Zollman’s will have you covered.
